business.headline: RBI MPC meeting: 5 key development reforms you must knowCurrently, UPI payments are mostly capped at Rs 1 lakh for both P2P and P2M. The RBI has suggested that National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) may now review and revise these limits based on evolving user needs.

RBI cuts Repo Rate by 25 points to 6% amid global trade warThe Reserve Bank of India has cut the repo rate by 25 basis points to 6%, potentially leading to lower EMIs for home loans. The RBI has also lowered the GDP forecast for FY26 to 6.5% from the earlier 6.7%. The Monetary Policy Committee unanimously decided to change the stance from neutral to accommodative, hinting at possible further easing. The RBI Governor expressed concerns over global trade uncertainties and their potential impact on inflation and growth.

Cheaper home, auto loan EMIs after RBI rate cut. What it means for youRBI reduces key lending rate to 6%. Lower interest rates are expected to make borrowing cheaper, which can help people buy homes or vehicles more easily.

RBI changes stance from neutral to accommodative: What does it mean?The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Sanjay Malhotra has announced a cut in the repo rate by 25 basis points, bringing it down from 6.25% to 6%.

RBI downgrades 2025-26 GDP forecast to 6.5% from 6.7% amid global tariff warWhile sharing the new projections, Governor Sanjay Malhotra said the downward revision of the GDP forecast was mainly due to growing risks in global trade and policy developments.

Donald Trump's 26% reciprocal tariffs on India come into effectA 26% tariff on Indian exports to the USA has come into effect. Key sectors impacted include electronics, gems and jewellery, auto components, and agricultural products. The Union Cabinet is set to meet to discuss India's strategy and the impact on exporters. The Indian government is in touch with exporters to minimise the impact, while also working on a bilateral trade agreement with the US.

Home loans to get cheaper as RBI cuts key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6%RBI MPC meeting: This is the second rate cut in a row, following a 25 basis point reduction in February. RBI also changed its earlier stance from neutral to 'accommodative'.

Trump's 26% tariffs on India come into effect, big Cabinet meet todayWith markets in a free fall since Donald Trump's reciprocal tariff announcement, the Union Cabinet will hold a crucial meeting today to strategise on ways to minimise the impact.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as RBI policy and global cues weigh on investorsThe S&P BSE Sensex fell by 255.49 points to 73,971.59, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 86.70 points to 22,449.15 as of 9:22 am.

RBI MPC: Will home loans get cheaper after today's policy announcement?RBI MPC meeting: In its last meeting held in February, the RBI cut the repo rate by 25 basis points. This was the first rate cut under RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra, and also the first cut in nearly five years.

Stock market today: Will RBI MPC decision pause Sensex, Nifty rally?The Sensex and Nifty ended Tuesday's session with big gains, but a global sell-off and worries about trade tensions are expected to affect today's opening.

Stocks to watch on April 9: NTPC, Adani Wilmar, Vodafone Idea, BPCLIn today's trade, many shares will be in focus due to key news developments. These include NTPC, BPCL, Adani Wilmar, Vodafone Idea, Cyient, PNB Housing Finance, and more.

entertainment.headline: Soha Ali Khan disappointed about BCCI retiring Pataudi CupThe Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) and the England and Wales Cricket Board's (ECB) decision to retire the Pataudi Trophy has sparked disappointment among the Pataudi family, as the trophy honours the legacy of Mansoor Ali Khan Pataudi, a pioneer in Indian cricket. Soha Ali Khan said in an interview that her father should be remembered in some form.

Jr NTR saddened as Pawan Kalyan's son gets injured in Singapore school fireJr NTR expressed his sorrow after Pawan Kalyan's youngest son, Mark Shankar, sustained injuries in a fire accident at his school in Singapore. Taking to X, he shared a note wishing him a speedy recovery.

Robert Pattinson in talks for Denis Villeneuve's star-studded Dune 3 cast: ReportDenis Villeneuve is considering Robert Pattinson for a role in the upcoming Dune: Messiah film. The potential casting adds to the star-studded lineup including Timothee Chalamet and Zendaya.

Director Pa Ranjith faces Internet's wrath for working with MeToo-accused actorDirector Pa Ranjith was questioned by internet users for working with MeToo-accused actor John Vijay. Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi President Thol Thirumavalavan shared a photo with Ranjith and his team after meeting them at Tiruchi airport.

Bazooka pre-release teaser: Mammootty packs a punch in Deeno Dennis's thrillerAhead of the highly anticipated release of Bazooka, the makers have unveiled a pre-release teaser, further adding to the growing buzz. The thriller stars superstar Mammootty, Gautham Vasudev Menon, and others.

Akshay Kumar stuns as Kathakali dancer in new look from Kesari 2Akshay Kumar shared a picture of himself dressed as a Kathakali dancer ahead of the release of Kesari 2. In the film he will be portraying the role of C Sankaran Nair, a lawyer and statesman.

Kajol opens up about daughter Nysa's Bollywood plansBuzz about Ajay Devgn and Kajol's daughter Nysa making her Bollywood debut has been circulating online. However, Kajol recently put an end to the rumours by addressing them at a public event.

L2 Empuraan box office: Mohanlal, Prithviraj's film slows down on Day 13L2: Empuraan Box Office Day 13: The Prithviraj Sukumaran and Mohanlal-starrer has entered the Rs 100 crore nett club in India. However, the action film saw a dip in its day-wise earnings on its second Tuesday.

Tamannaah dodges personal question about 'Vijay' amid breakup rumoursAt the Odela 2 trailer launch, Tamannaah Bhatia engaged in a playful banter with a reporter. Her witty reply to a cheeky question about her personal life drew laughter from the audience.

Chiranjeevi heads to Singapore with Pawan Kalyan after his son's fire injuryMegastar Chiranjeevi and his wife Surekha jetted off to Singapore with Andhra Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan on Tuesday. Pawan Kalyan's son, Mark Shankar, was injured in a school fire in Singapore.

Good Bad Ugly director admits his life changed after meeting 'rare gem' Ajith KumarGood Bad Ugly director Adhik Ravichandran opened up about his life after meeting Ajith Kumar. In a candid interview, he shared how the actor turned the spotlight on him.

Smriti Irani to make comeback in Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi? Ektaa Kapoor hintsDid filmmaker Ektaa Kapoor just confirm Smriti Irani's return to Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi reboot? Seems like the actor-turned-politician will make her much-awaited TV comeback after 15 years.

Allu Arjun-Atlee's poster copied from Dune? Internet points out similaritiesAllu Arjun and director Atlee's project was announced on Tuesday, on the occasion of the actor's birthday. However, the internet has pointed out that one of the posters of the film was allegedly copied from 'Dune'.

Priyanka Chopra, Nick Jonas kiss at his Broadway debut. Don't miss Malti's giftPriyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas shared a passionate kiss at his Broadway debut, 'The Last Five Years'. Their daughter, Malti, gifted a handmade poster for her father.
Producer Salim Akhtar, who launched Rani Mukerji, diesProducer Salim Akhtar died on April 8. He is survived by his wife, Shama Akhtar, and their son, Samad Akhtar.

Hulu outage hits thousands after Handmaid's Tale premiereHulu experienced a major outage on April 8, affecting over 13,000 users. Login and streaming issues were reported after The Handmaid's Tale premiere. Hulu advised basic troubleshooting and device restarts.
Kunal Kamra 'would rather check into mental hospital' than be on Bigg BossComedian Kunal Kamra shared a post on social media and revealed that he has been approached for the new season of Bigg Boss.

Odela 2 trailer: Tamannaah Bhatia as Shiva Shakti is ready to take on evilTamannaah Bhatia-starrer Odela 2 trailer released today, April 8. The supernatural thriller by Sampath Nandi will release in theatres on April 17.

Malaika Arora stuns with her dance moves on Roop Suhana on Hip Hop India 2. WatchActor Malaika Arora impressed fans with her moves again in a new video. The actor is judging the show with Remo D'Souza.

general news.headline: Will protect your property: Mamata Banerjee assures Muslims over Waqf lawMamata Banerjee asked the minorities to keep faith in her government while asserting that she wouldn't allow divide and rule in Bengal.

Home loans to get cheaper as RBI cuts key lending rate by 25 basis points to 6%RBI MPC meeting: This is the second rate cut in a row, following a 25 basis point reduction in February. RBI also changed its earlier stance from neutral to 'accommodative'.

Mallikarjun Kharge ups ante against PM Modi: He will sell India and walk awaySharpening his attack on PM Modi's home turf in Gujarat, Mallikarjun Kharge claimed that his government 'will sell off the entire country and walk away' as everything from mining to airports is being 'handed over to industrialist friends.'

26/11 plotter Tahawwur Rana extradited from US, now on flight to India: SourcesUpon arrival in India, Tahawwur Rana will be held in the custody of the National Investigation Agency (NIA) for the initial weeks of interrogation and investigation.

Mobs plunder KFC, Bata outlets in Bangladesh. Why Dhaka is on boil againBangladesh protests: Outlets of international brands such as Bata, KFC, Pizza Hut, and Puma were vandalised and looted in Bangladesh as thousands took to the streets to protest against Israel.

Suchana Seth, Bengaluru tech CEO arrested for son's murder, assaults cop in prisonSuchana Seth, accused of killing her son, was booked for assaulting a woman constable inside Goa's Colvale jail. She allegedly abused and attacked the constable after forcefully taking a prison register.

This is how city-killer asteroid that could collide with the Moon looksAstronomers have now constructed a 3D model of asteroid 2024 YR4 using observations conducted by the Gemini South telescope in Chile.

India, China should stand together against US abuse of tariffs: Chinese officialChina urged India to stand united against escalating US tariffs under Trump. As the Trump administration announced a 104 per cent tariffs on Chinese goods, Beijing vowed retaliation, calling Washington's moves unilateral and illegitimate.

Video: Chaos in J&K Assembly as AAP MLA thrashed by BJP leaders over Hindu remarkThe tensions flared after the BJP accused Mehraj Malik of making derogatory remarks against Hindus during media interactions. BJP MLA Vikram Randhawa lashed out at Malik, demanding strict action against him and even invoking the Public Safety Act (PSA).

GT vs RR Match Preview: Can recovering Rajasthan handle in-form Gujarat?IPL 2025, GT vs RR Match Preview: Gujarat Titans aim to extend their winning run as they host Rajasthan Royals in Ahmedabad. With no injury concerns for either side and varying pitch conditions in play, the showdown promises a thrilling contest under the scorching April sun.

Mamaearth's Ghazal Alagh's empowering post on pregnancy gets loads of love onlineIn her post, Ghazal Alagh recalled the moment she first heard the words, "You're pregnant! Now you should take it slow?" The intention behind the comment was good but Alagh admitted that she did not like it.

Piyush Goyal defends 'dukandaari' remark, blasts Congress for false narrativePiyush Goyal, who had compared Indian startups with their Chinese counterparts - praising China's strides in AI and deep-tech - said his intention was to push Indian entrepreneurs toward greater ambition, not belittle their efforts.

Pathetic, needy, dumb: Elon Musk quits livestream after being bullied by gamersElon Musk's livestream turns disastrous as he's trolled, dies repeatedly in-game, and rage-quits mid-flight while showcasing Starlink Wi-Fi.

Governor's post 'colonial relic': Tamil Nadu Minister hails Supreme Court rulingTamil Nadu Minister Palanivel Thiaga Rajan called the Governor's role a colonial relic used to obstruct democracy, welcoming the Supreme Court verdict limiting their powers. He said Tamil Nadu seeks parity, not exceptionalism, in education governance.

Allu Arjun-Atlee's poster copied from Dune? Internet points out similaritiesAllu Arjun and director Atlee's project was announced on Tuesday, on the occasion of the actor's birthday. However, the internet has pointed out that one of the posters of the film was allegedly copied from 'Dune'.

'This protest demands blood': Provocative speeches that sparked Bengal violenceExclusive visuals from the anti-Waqf Act rally exposed a trail of provocative speeches that escalated the violence, prompting a police crackdown, detentions, and the imposition of prohibitory orders across Murshidabad's sensitive zones.

Seeds of controversy: Why India is split over implementing GM mustardGM mustard or DMH-11, developed by researchers at the Centre for Genetic Manipulation of Crop Plants, at the University of Delhi, is a hybrid
variety of mustard produced by a cross between "Varuna" and "Early Heera-2" mustard.

Philippine politician offers to sleep with 'single, fertile mothers'; faces flakThe controversy erupted when a video surfaced showing candidate Christian Sia offering to "sleep with" lonely, fertile single mothers.

Akshay Kumar stuns as Kathakali dancer in new look from Kesari 2Akshay Kumar shared a picture of himself dressed as a Kathakali dancer ahead of the release of Kesari 2. In the film he will be portraying the role of C Sankaran Nair, a lawyer and statesman.

Delhi Chief Minister still without official home after nearly 50 days in officeRekha Gupta's insistence on not occupying the controversial 'Sheesh Mahal' and her push for a Civil Lines or Lutyens' Delhi government bungalow have left officials scrambling, with no resolution in sight.

Chiranjeevi heads to Singapore with Pawan Kalyan after his son's fire injuryMegastar Chiranjeevi and his wife Surekha jetted off to Singapore with Andhra Pradesh Deputy Chief Minister Pawan Kalyan on Tuesday. Pawan Kalyan's son, Mark Shankar, was injured in a school fire in Singapore.

Cops raid Karnataka rented house, find Rs 500 'Reverse Bank of India' notesThe police raided a rented house in Dandeli, Uttara Kannada, uncovering suspicious currency. The currency was a stash of Rs 500 notes marked 'for movie shooting'.

sports.headline: Giving new ball to Jofra Archer has made a big difference for us: Shane BondRajasthan Royals assistant and fast bowling coach Shane Bond acknowledged Jofra Archer's impact with the new ball and said that the fast bowler has made a big difference with the ball for them.

Chahal bowling just 1 over? Fans slam puzzling move from Shreyas IyerYuzvendra Chahal, one of the most expensive players in this year's IPL bowled just 1 over in Punjab Kings' win against CSK. Fans slammed Punjab captain Shreyas Iyer for his puzzling call on Tuesday.

With no injury concerns for either side and varying pitch conditions in play, the showdown promises a thrilling contest under the scorching April sun.

Aiden Markram reveals Digvesh Rathi's biggest weapon for successLucknow Super Giants batter Aiden Markram revealed Digvesh Rathi's biggest weapon for success in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). Rathi is the second-highest wicket-taker of the season so far for his team with seven wickets to his name.

MS Dhoni is not the problem: Robin Uthappa on CSK's dwindling formChennai Super Kings lost their fourth straight match in IPL 2025 on Tuesday, April 8. MS Dhoni came up to bat at No.5, but was not able to take his team over the line vs Punjab Kings.

Real Madrid coach Ancelotti hopeful of Bernabeu comeback vs ArsenalAfter a heavy first-leg defeat to Arsenal, Carlo Ancelotti believes Real Madrid can still mount a comeback at the Bernabéu, banking on their historic resilience in Europe ahead of the decisive second leg on April 17.

PBKS vs CSK: BCCI punishes Glenn Maxwell for breaching IPL code of conductPunjab Kings all-rounder Glenn Maxwell was fined and handed a demerit point after breaching the IPL Code of Conduct during his side's win over CSK, becoming the sixth player this season to be penalised by the BCC.

Priyansh Arya is a bright prospect for India: Shashank praises PBKS youngsterPunjab Kings batter Shashank Singh praised Priyansh Arya after the young opener hit the fastest hundred by an uncapped player and the fifth-fastest hundred in IPL history.

CSK coach Fleming highlights positives after PBKS loss: We batted a bit betterChennai Super Kings coach Stephen Fleming highlighted his side's improved batting performance in Tuesday's narrow loss against Punjab Kings. However, the CSK coach slammed the team's poor fielding and bowling after their fourth consecutive IPL 2025 loss.

Shashank Singh credits Brian Lara for confidence booster after 52 vs CSKIPL 2025, PBKS vs CSK: Shashank Singh scored 52 runs off 36 balls as the Punjab Kings recorded their third win of the tournament after beating Chennai Super Kings by 18 runs on Tuesday in Mullanpur.

CSK lost on the field, top-order failures: coach Fleming after PBKS lossChennai Super Kings head coach Stephen Fleming blamed poor fielding and inconsistent top-order batting for the team's recent struggles, following their fourth consecutive defeat in IPL 2025 against a dominant Punjab Kings.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
